  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CellErrorAnimator
    This class is responsible for animating the error effect on a TextField.
    CellHelpAnimator
    This class is responsible for animating a visual hint on a TextField.
    CellValueConverter
    Converts between Integer values and their String representations for use in JavaFX controls like TextField.
    StartController
    Controller for the start screen of the Sudoku game.
    SudokuController
    Controller class for the main Sudoku game view.
    TextFilter
    Utility class that provides a TextFormatter to restrict user input in a TextField to only digits from 1 to 6.
    VictoryController
    Controller class for the victory screen, which is displayed when the player wins the game.
